DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study heathy people investigate safety , toleration time course PF-03654764 blood , follow multiple dos give twice daily mouth 10 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study In Healthy People To Investigate The Safety , Toleration And Time Course Of Blood Concentrations Of Multiple Doses Of PF-03654764 , Given By Mouth
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject . ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . A positive urine drug screen . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) 5 halflives precede first dose study medication .
DOC.keyword: Phase 1 multiple dose safety toleration pharmacokinetic
